C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution

C-0187.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles

C-0002.name: Prevent containers from allowing command execution
Prevent containers from allowing command execution

containers.name: getmail-cronjob
command: kubectl exec -n rt `kubectl get pods -o=name -n rt | grep cron` -- su rt -c '/usr/bin/getmail --rcfile=getmailrc -g /getmail/config'

containers.name: getmail-cronjob
command: kubectl exec -n rt `kubectl get pods -o=name -n rt | grep cron` -- su rt -c '/opt/rt5/sbin/rt-fulltext-indexer --quiet 2>&1 | grep -v "Words longer than 2047 characters are ignored" | grep -v "word is too long to be indexed"'

cp /custom/siteconfig/RT_SiteConfig.pm /opt/rt5/etc/ ; cp /custom/msmtp/msmtp.conf /etc/msmtprc ; cp /custom/shredder/* /opt/rt5/var/data/RT-Shredder/ ; chmod -R rt 0600 /opt/rt5/var/data/gpg/ ; cp /usr/share/zoneinfo/America/Sao_Paulo /etc/localtime

containers.name: getmail-cronjob
command: kubectl exec -n rt `kubectl get pods -o=name -n rt | grep cron` -- su rt -c '/opt/rt5/sbin/rt-email-dashboards'

containers.name: getmail-cronjob
command: kubectl exec -n rt `kubectl get pods -o=name -n rt | grep cron` -- su rt -c '/opt/rt5/sbin/rt-clean-sessions'

cp /custom/siteconfig/RT_SiteConfig.pm /opt/rt5/etc/ ; cp /custom/msmtp/msmtp.conf /etc/msmtprc ; cp /custom/shredder/* /opt/rt5/var/data/RT-Shredder/ ; chmod -R rt 0600 /opt/rt5/var/data/gpg/ ; cp /usr/share/zoneinfo/America/Sao_Paulo /etc/localtime ; chmod 777 -R /getmail

controls.name: Minimize wildcard use in Roles and ClusterRoles
Prevent containers from allowing command execution
